title: Best of The Herd: 09/04/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/04/2018
description:
Colin says you simply cannot trade a player like Khalil Mack and has no idea what the Raiders are doing. He talks about where he was right and wrong over the weekend including admitting how bad Jim Harbaugh and Michigan looked. Plus, FOX NFL Insider Peter Schrager talks about the Le'Veon Bell situation and where the Raiders went wrong with Mack. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
